EmailTemplate.name: Step 16 - Time To Energize!
EmailTemplate.subject: Update From Palmetto On Your Project - Lets Turn On Your Solar System!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {!Opportunity.Contact__c},
We are ready to walk you through the 3 easy steps to turn on your solar system, and start saving you money!
After our technology teams finishing building your online profile we will send over your energy monitoring access.
Please call Palmetto Customer Care with any further questions.
Thank You,
Palmetto Customer Care 855-339-1831 customer.care@palmetto.com
